rules_text: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, put a Devastation counter on Imminent Devastation. Then if Imminent Devastation has five or more Devastation counters on it, create a 3/3 red and green Dragon creature token with flying and devour 2. [i](As this enters, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. That creature enters with twice that many +1/+1 counters on it.)[/i]
